price: Allah gehört (alles), was in den Himmeln und was auf der Erde ist, und Allah genügt als Sachwalter.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
